channel.title: U.S. Health Insurance Explained
channel.description:
Hey so this is a total link dropping but I guess this is the right forum category for it. I spent 400 hours researching and writing this content about health insurance for individual and small businesses.
Here's the articles I wrote. [Understanding Health Insurance][1]
**Topics**
Understanding Insurance Terminology Hypothetical Medical Situations Types of Insurance Plans How to Choose a Health Insurance Plan Ways to Buy Insurance Misunderstandings & Myths Small Business Health Insurance
[1]: https://lessaccounting.com/insurance/

item.title: U.S. Health Insurance Explained
item.dc:creator: NicheDiver
item.description:
I could show you a recent bill in the amount of $1430.00 for a 38 mile, non-emergency ambulance ride but suddenly I’m too depressed to even bother. Thanks @andrey.
